title: WTB or Trade for T206 Merkle Piedmont 460 Factory 42
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: WTB or Trade for T206 Merkle Piedmont 460 Factory 42
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I would like to buy or trade for a T206 Merkle Piedmont 350/460, Factory 42.  Any condition is fine, raw or graded, no difference.  We can work on a price or I have some trading stock.
I you have one and don't want to get rid of it, I would love to see some scans.
Thanks for the consideration,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
